message: 根据您的口味偏好（7分甜度，7分酒精浓度），为您推荐以下几款饮品：

detail.title: 21st Century (Difford's recipe)
detail.description: Chocolate, in all its forms, from an intense dark block to sweet melted fondue, has had a spell over our taste buds since the Olmec people in Mesoamerica...
detail.ingredients: ["45 ml Patrón Reposado tequila", "25 ml Dutch Cacao white crème de cacao", "20 ml Aromatized wine (e.g. Lillet Blanc)", "5 ml Blanc quinquina/kina (e.g. Mattei Cap Corse, Bonal or Kina L'Aér", "5 ml Lemon juice (freshly squeezed)"]
detail.steps: ["Select and pre-chill a COUPE GLASS .", "Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.", "SHAKE all ingredients with ice.", "FINE STRAIN into chilled glass.", "EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish."]

recommendations.name: 21st Century (Difford's recipe)
recommendations.description: 以龙舌兰酒为基酒，加入白可可利口酒和芳香葡萄酒，带有巧克力风味和柑橘清新口感
recommendations.reason: 完美匹配您的7分甜度和7分酒精浓度要求，口感平衡优雅

detail.title: 21st Century Negroni
detail.description: Chinato (pronounced kee-NOT-oh') is an aromatised and fortified wine from Italy's Piedmont region and is traditionally based on Barolo wine, the famous...
detail.ingredients: ["45 ml Mancino Vermouth di Torino Chinato", "30 ml Hayman's London Dry Gin", "15 ml Strucchi Red Bitter (Campari-style liqueur)", "10 ml Strucchi Bianco Vermouth", "2 dash Peychaud's or other Creole-style bitters"]
detail.steps: ["Select and pre-chill an OLD-FASHIONED GLASS .", "Prepare garnish of grapefruit zest twist and orange wedge or slice.", "STIR all ingredients with ice.", "STRAIN into ice-filled glass (preferably over a large cube or chunk of block ice).", "EXPRESS grapefruit zest twist over cocktail and discard.", "Garnish with orange wedge or slice."]

recommendations.name: 21st Century Negroni
recommendations.description: 现代版尼格罗尼，使用意大利Chinato葡萄酒和伦敦干金酒，带有苦甜平衡的复杂风味

detail.title: 50:50 Margarita
